en-US: Welcome to Freestyle Ranch, I've got some crops that need water, and don't let them critters\neat anything!

How To Play:

[Esc] - Open Menu (while in game)
[A/D] - Control the Mech Legs's direction
[W/S] - Control the Mech's throttle
[Space] - Full stop the throttle
[Left Click] - Fire Weapon 1
[Right Click] - Fire Weapon 2

Protect the crops
Probably something else when I make more
